Summary: blue/green light flying in southern sky
divs: sighting detailsmy friend [first name removed cms\dr] was sitting in the front yard and he noticed a blue\green light flying in the southern sky. [first name removed cms\dr] first noticed the light was just hanging in the sky and at the same time a plane was flying east to west and passed the light. after the plane passed a few seconds later the light seemed to fall. [first name removed cms\dr] then called my wife to come see it because he thought it was a plane crashing. when my wife came out the light rose back up to it's previous level. i was called out at this time. we watched the light move back and forth and up and down for about 5 minutes. the light seemed to move in a circular fashion but it is hard to say for sure because of the distance and darkness. [first name removed cms\dr] and myself were kind of excited but [spouse first name removed cms\dr] was a bit spooked. the object eventually dropped out of sight beyond our view. [first name removed cms\dr] and i both agreed the light seemed to move like a hang glider would but there doesn't seem to be a place for someone to hang glide at that altitude.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There was one other sighting in Tucson on or around November 23rd 2010
